actions.name: Primordial Sea

cost.trigger: At the start of combat, when switched in, or when the user gains this ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat, when switched in, or when the user gains this ability.

Effect: The Weather is changed to Deluge. When the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or switches out the weather changes to Thunderstorm for 5 rounds.

system.description:
